results.message: Seg 8: word_repetition — 'you have you have' - repeated phrase likely from ASR merging overlapping speech
Seg 13: nonsense — 'I'm going to body like that' - grammatically broken, likely misheard
Seg 89: nonsense — 'Roll nish' - unclear what was actually said, possible mishearing of a name or phrase
Seg 112: nonsense — 'need a donation wedges' - likely misheard, context suggests discussion about shoes/wedges
Seg 119: nonsense — 'go polish like this' - unclear transcription, likely misheard instruction about positioning
Seg 122: nonsense — 'what kind of is this' - missing word, likely 'what kind of [shit/place] is this'
Seg 152: language_confusion — 'hit it ranch me mulatto' - appears to be ASR hallucination; likely a reference to Eric Andre's 'Ranch it up' sketch but 'mulatto' is likely misheard
